title: HELP Can't reconnect
body:
Transitioning into loading screen from champ select, game crashed then can't reconnect. 

After clicking the reconnect button, the LoL icon did not even show up on screen as it should be

replies.body:
Is this the problem? I have the same thing. OPTUS. This needs to be fixed :S

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WyLVUBOK-severe-bug-that-can-effect-anybody-by-the-looks-not-the-firewall-bug-urgent-ban-immenent
Exactly the same issue I was having. I went and played stuff on steam instead...
Ended up playing DOTA lel

It's extremely frustrating and out of no where.
RiotKO (RKO)
Are you running avast antivirus? I just updated avast, and I saw another guy post a problem about avast... maybe its an AV problem?

http://malwarefixes.com/threats/win32evo-gen-susp/

Avast is finding this in the latest lol updates (see attached).
Yes I am running Avast is this the cause of the problem?
I don't know if it is a false positive, or if riot has been hacked and everyone has ended up with malware on their system ;)
following the location of the file, it is no where to be seen
Okay, so you don't have the. Exe in that file location? Delete the file 'deploy', then run the game and it will auto reinstall the files again with the .exe as well
Is there anyway to stop Avast from doing so? Or is this deploy a virus itself and should be deleted?
Yeah definately avast i go into the virus chest and restore and add to exception list - im now logged in and in game!

SOLUTION:

go to Avast Virus Vault and right click on the League of Legends process that got caught and overwrite file and add to exclusions list.

I've just tested and I'm now able to spectate a game which I was never able to previously do.
I uninstalled Avast after the problem started. The problem still occured. I have now re-installed it, however there is nothing in the 'Virus Chest' at the moment. Any ideas?

Fixed. Turns out AVAST was blocking a specific file (as previously stated in this thread), and when I uninstalled Avast, it deleted the League of Legends.exe file under the hidden file of 'deploy' in the league of legends folder. Just deleted the file, launched patcher, it redownloaded the file and the missing .exe, and now it works.
Getting the same thing. I wasn't having an issue earlier on....I got the warning and everything. Ugh
I still can't get into games.
Yeah, as expected, losing LP and getting some leaver warning message for server issues that Riot should be fixing, at least turn loss prevented on
yeah, I got a leaver buster warning too... %%%% my life, riot you %%%%s.
and i lost lp too! omg.

I've got exactly the same problem. The launcher is still running in the sys tray, and when you click on it it prompts you to reconnect, but it never reconnects. The screen just minimises and does nothing. I've tried restarting LOL and the computer...no joy.

I'm on TPG for ISP - anyone else?
on Optus
Telstra
My ISP is Adam Internet.
Yes, TPG here.
In the game it said issues reconnecting with a major ISP....woulda been helpful to know which one - perhaps it is more than one?

Currently on the Service Status, but only ONE ISP having issues?

Network Operations â€“ Last Friday at 10:34 PM

We're aware of a major Oceanic ISP is encountering issues and players may not be able to login. Some players may also be suffering from game reconnects.
Same thing happened to me and my friend at the same time in the same game.

> [{quoted}](name=Kwang is God,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=xz4swYQc,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-07T05:42:50.933+0000)
>
> Transitioning into loading screen from champ select, game crashed then can't reconnect. 
> 
> After clicking the reconnect button, the LoL icon did not even show up on screen as it should be

riot you are useless!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
we need your help
I have had this problem for days. Only way to get it to work for me was to quit the whole game and relog in
Im still getting the same problem after uninstalling AV
Is the problem still happening? What have you tried?
WTF I find leagueoflegend.exe in avast chest
Same problem here. I un installed AVAST after the problem started however, and can't see lol blocked in the firewall anywhere. Problem still not fixed.
well i have neither running on my computer.
Uh oh im stuck in a 1 v 0 custom game with the same issue ...

Everything I try wouldn't work..
I tried fixing it like 10 times
Went in custom game and I can't connect, I thought if it would be a normal it might work but nope
In a game and I can't reconnect right now.. :(
Just lost a ranked game.. Loss prevented you say ?.. ( I just lost LP )

tried to start a custom just then, did the same thing.
I even got a leave buster warning....
yeah, I have the same problem.
Hope a loss prevented is given for this.
